title: Jhin and Reworked Shen
body: Are they coming out exactly when patch 6.2 comes out?? will they be released in the same week? Pls Help Plox Ty

replies.body:
Reworks always hit on the patch, considering the champion can't exist in two states at once.
New champions are typically activated several days after the patch.

Honestly it's not that hard to pay attention to past actions. ~_~

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZW6FicL5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-26T07:40:12.470+0000)
>
> Reworks always hit on the patch, considering the champion can't exist in two states at once.
> New champions are typically activated several days after the patch.
> 
> Honestly it's not that hard to pay attention to past actions. ~_~

Aight m8 relax
